Classes

File
This class represents and uploaded file.
FileFactory
The purpose of this clase is to generate file objects.
Files
A class to represent all the uploaded files to the server. Returns the file object as a parameter.
Parameters
This class contains and distributes the parameters with a request. Get, Post, Cookie, etc.
ServerParameters
This class represents the parameters contained in the $_SERVER super global.
Request
Gathers and contains the http request.
Response
Crafts and sends an http response to the client.
